title: 如何看待部分左翼对人权法案的发声？
contents:
https://transnationalsolidarity.net/hong-kong-human-rights-and-democracy-act-hkhrda-a-progressive-critique-%E9%97%9C%E6%96%BC%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E3%80%8A%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E4%BA%BA%E6%AC%8A%E6%B3%95%E3%80%8B%E7%9A%84%E6%B0%91%E9%96%93/
